oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Sharḥ al-asmāʼ al-ḥusná : manuscript, undated
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Written in several hands, in one or two columns, from 21 to 26 lines per pages, in black rubricated in red. Folios 6v-13r framed within double black lines.
From the books of Abd ʻal-Salām al-Shaṭṭī al-Ḥanbalī, 1280 AH [1863-4 AD].

With this is bound: 1. Sharḥ al-manẓūmah al-Dimyāṭīyah / Aḥmad Zarrūq (ff. 6r-13r) -- 2. Rafʻ al-iltibās ʻan munkir al-iqtibās / Muḥammad ibn Abī al-Luṭf (ff. 14r-20v) -- 3. Risālah fī taqrīr al-adillah wa-al-shawāhid ʻalá wujūb al-ḥufwah fī al-masājid / Muḥammad ibn Abī al-Luṭf (ff. 22r-26v) -- 4. Kitāb al-Kashf ʻan mujāwazat hādhihi al-ummah al-alf / al-Suyūṭī (ff. 29v-34r) -- 5. Dībājah-ʼi Tafsīr / Abū al-Saʻūd Muḥammad al-ʻImādī (ff. 34v-38v) -- 6. Awāʼil al-awāʼil / ʻAbd al-Karīm al-Araklī (ff. 39r-63v) -- 7. Majmūʻ tawārīkh lā baʼsa bihi (ff. 64r-73v) -- 8. Kitāb Dhikr al-ikhtilājāt fī badan al-insān (ff. 74r-77v) -- 9. Qilādat al-durr al-manthūr fī dhikr al-baʻth wa-al-nushūr / ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz al-Dīrīnī (ff. 78r-80r) 10. Qaṣīdah / Muḥammad ibn Abī al-Luṭf (ff. 80v-81r).
MS Arab 337. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: God (Islam)--Name
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: شرح الاسماء الحسنى : مخطوطة، undated
